Classes/Interpose/Task/State.html#/s:12I.name: prepared
Classes/Interpose/Task/State.html#/s:12I.abstract: The task is prepared to be nterposed.

Classes/Interpose/Task/State.html#/s:12I.name: error(_:)
Classes/Interpose/Task/State.html#/s:12I.abstract: An error happened while interposing a method.

Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.name: origIMP
Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.abstract: The original implementation is set once the swizzling is complete

Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.name: replacementIMP
Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.abstract: The replacement implementation is created on initialization time.

Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.name: init(class:selector:implementation:)
Classes/Interpose/Task.html#/s:12Interpo.abstract: Initialize a new task to interpose an instance method.

Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.name: methodNotFound
Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.abstract: The method couldn’t be found. Usually happens for when you use stringified selectors that do not exist.

Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.name: nonExistingImplementation
Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.abstract: The implementation could not be found. Class must be in a weird state for this to happen.

Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.name: unexpectedImplementation
Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.abstract: Someone else changed the implementation; reverting removed this implementation.

Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.name: invalidState
Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html#/s.abstract: Can’t revert or apply if already done so.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: class
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Stores swizzle tasks and executes them at once.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: tasks
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Lists all tasks for the current interpose class object.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: init(_:builder:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Initializes an instance of Interpose for a specific class.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: hook(_:_:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Hook an @objc dynamic instance method via selector name on the current class.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: hook(_:_:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Hook an @objc dynamic instance method via selector on the current class.

Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html.name: InterposeError
Classes/Interpose/InterposeError.html.abstract: The list of errors while hooking a method.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via classParts string array.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:completion:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via classParts string array, with completion handler.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via className string..

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:completion:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via className string, with completion handler.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: Waiter
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Helper that stores tasks to a specific class and executes them once the class becomes available.

Classes/Interpose.html.name: Interpose
Classes/Interpose.html.abstract: Helper to swizzle methods the right way, via replacing the IMP.
